column1: (Issued at 07.00 a.m. on 06 September 2024, for next 24 hours)
Showers may occur  at  Several  places  in the sea  areas off the coast  extending from Puttalam to
Matara  via  Colombo  and  Galle.  Showers  or  thundershowers  may  occur  at  a  few  places  in  the
eastern sea areas during the afternoon or night.
Winds will be south-westerly in direction and wind speed will be (30-40) kmph.
